content: समर्थनं --ना {@--1@} Establishing, supporting, corroborating. {@--2@} Defending, vindicating, justifying; स्थितेष्वेतत्समर्थनं <ls>K. P. 7.</ls> {@--3@} Pleading, advocating. {@--4@} Judging, considering, imagining. {@--5@} Deliberation, determination, deciding on the propriety or otherwise of anything. {@--6@} Adequacy, efficacy, force, capability. {@--7@} Energy, perseverance. {@--8@} Reconciling differences, allaying disputes. {@--9@} Objection.
